title: Dive into the fun in Key West!
seo_title: Dive into the fun in Key West!
seo_description: 24 North Hotel features a year-round outdoor pool where you can enjoy a drink or two at the bar! Lounge by the pool or enjoy our nightly happy hour with live music.
short_description: 24 North Hotel features a year-round outdoor pool where you can enjoy a drink or two at the bar! Lounge by the pool or enjoy our nightly happy hour with live music.
long_description:
24 North Hotel features a year-round outdoor pool where you can enjoy a drink or two at the bar! Lounge by the pool or enjoy our nightly happy hour with live music.

Unwind in the comfort of your room, which comes with a flat-screen TV, coffee machine and the best beds you've ever slept on!

Stay 1 night receive up to 15% on your entire stay.
Stay 2 nights receive up to 20% on your entire stay.
Stay 3 nights receive up to 25% on your entire stay.
Stay 5 nights or more receive up to 30% on your entire stay.

ALSO RECEIVE

• 50% off your Resort Fee.
• 3 Free Rewards.

Stay Dates: NOW through October 31st 2019
Offer Valid till May 25th, 2019

ALSO RECEIVE

• Promotion is applied to new reservations only.
• Blackout dates apply.
• Non – Refundable.

So...what are you waiting for?
terms_conditions:
Non-Refundable rate. Your credit card will be charged 100% of the total price of the reservation at the time of booking.

No refund will be provided in case of modifications or cancellation. Please note, if canceled, modified or in case of No-Show or Early Departure, the total price of the reservation will be charged.

A hold of $100 will be placed on the guest credit card at check-in for incidentals. This hold will be released upon check-out pending any incidental charges.

Resort Fee provides guests the following services

  • Shuttle service loop to old town.
  • Onsite concierge.
  • Access to fitness center and 2 pools.
  • Newspaper available in lobby.
  • Resort activities and entertainment.
  • Daily water in room.
  • Keepsake luggage tags.
  • Wireless high speed internet access.
  • Local calls.
  • Onsite parking.
  • 10% off Starbucks.

Guarantee/Deposit and Change/Cancellation Fees will depend on selected dates and room/rate combination.
